Blackrock Mountain.name: Dragon Egg
Blackrock Mountain.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/1 Whelp.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Think of them as bullets for your dragon gun.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Twilight Whelp
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +2 Health.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Gang Up
Blackrock Mountain.text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 copies of it into your deck.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: If you are thinking about visiting Moonbrook, you better roll deep.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Lava Shock
Blackrock Mountain.text: Deal $2 damage. Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Chocolate lava cake is shockingly delicious.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Quick Shot
Blackrock Mountain.text:
Deal $3 damage.
If your hand is empty, draw a card.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Han shot first.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Resurrect
Blackrock Mountain.text: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Revenge
Blackrock Mountain.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $3 damage instead.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Blackwing Technician
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: This is who you go to when your Blackwing needs a tune up. Don't go to a cut rate Blackwing tune up shop!
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Demonwrath
Blackrock Mountain.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to all
minions except Demons.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Druid of the Flame
Blackrock Mountain.text: Choose One - Transform into a 5/2 minion; or a 2/5 minion.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Druids who fought too long in Northrend were easily seduced by Ragnaros; a mug of hot chocolate was generally all it took.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Flamewaker
Blackrock Mountain.text: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they don’t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Imp Gang Boss
Blackrock Mountain.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Axe Flinger
Blackrock Mountain.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Once a lowly "Stick Flinger", he's been relentless on the path to his ultimate dream: "Tauren Flinger".
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Core Rager
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: If your hand is empty, gain +3/+3.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: It takes a special kind of hunter to venture deep into a firey lava pit and convince a monster who lives there to come home and be a cuddly housepet.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Dragonkin Sorcerer
Blackrock Mountain.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain +1/+1.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Dragonkin Sorcerers be all "I'm a wizard" and everyone else be all "daaaaang".
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Fireguard Destroyer
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: Gain 1-4 Attack. Overload: (1)
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Hungry Dragon
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for_your opponent.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Hungry Hungry Dragon is NOT a fun game.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Blackwing Corruptor
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: He got his name when he gave Blackwing some comic books and rock & roll records.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Dark Iron Skulker
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all undamaged enemy minions.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: He loves skulking. He skulks after hours just for the joy of it, but his friends are pretty worried he'll get burnt out.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Dragon Consort
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: The next Dragon you play costs (2) less.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Everybody wants someone to snuggle with. Even giant armored scaly draconic beasts of destruction.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Dragon's Breath
Blackrock Mountain.text: Deal $4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy?  It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Grim Patron
Blackrock Mountain.text: After this minion survives damage, summon another Grim Patron.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: If you love getting your face punched, come to the Grim Guzzler!
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Solemn Vigil
Blackrock Mountain.text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Drakonid Crusher
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Drakonids were created to have all the bad parts of a dragon in the form of a humanoid. But, like, why?
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Emperor Thaurissan
Blackrock Mountain.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Volcanic Drake
Blackrock Mountain.text: Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Volcanic Drakes breathe lava instead of fire. The antacid vendor at Thorium Point does a brisk business with them.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Rend Blackhand
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a Legendary minion.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Rend believes he is the True Warchief of the Horde and he keeps editing the wikipedia page for "Warchief of the Horde" to include his picture.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Chromaggus
Blackrock Mountain.text: Whenever you draw a card, put another copy into your hand.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Left head and right head can never agree about what to eat for dinner, so they always end up just eating ramen again.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Majordomo Executus
Blackrock Mountain.text: Deathrattle: Replace your hero with Ragnaros the Firelord.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: You thought Executus turned you into Ragnaros, but really Ragnaros was in you the whole time.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Nefarian
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: Add 2 random spells to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: They call him "Blackwing" because he's a black dragon...... and he's got wings.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Volcanic Lumberer
Blackrock Mountain.text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: The roots, the roots, the roots is on fire!
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
